00049 // statics 
00050 
00051 std::pair<DbCore::seq_iter, DbCore::seq_iter> 
00052 DbCore::find_after(EUROPA::TimelineId const &tl, TICK now) {
00053   sequence_type const &seq = tl->getTokenSequence();
00054   seq_iter i = seq.begin(), last = seq.end();
00055 
00056   for(; last!=i && (*i)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=now; ++i);
00057   return  std::make_pair(i, last);
00058 }

00063 DbCore::DbCore(EuropaReactor &owner)
00064   :EUROPA::PlanDatabaseListener(owner.assembly().plan_db()),
00065    m_reactor(owner) {}
00066 
00067 DbCore::~DbCore() {}

00071 std::string DbCore::dbg(std::string const &base) const {
00072   return base+":_"+m_reactor.getName().str();
00073 }

00075 // modifiers 
00076 
00077 void DbCore::initialize() {
00078   TICK initial = m_reactor.getInitialTick();
00079   EUROPA::TokenSet const &all = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getTokens();  
00080   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain mission_scope(initial, m_reactor.getFinalTick()),
00081     end_scope(initial+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00082 
00083   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=all.begin(); all.end()!=i; ++i) {
00084     if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00085       // First check that the fact applies to a single object
00086       if( !(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain().isSingleton() ) 
00087        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts should be associated to a single object"); 
00088 
00089       // extract the object
00090       EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &domain=(*i)->getObject()->baseDomain();
00091       EUROPA::ObjectId object = domain.getObject(domain.getSingletonValue());
00092 
00093       // check that he object is not en external timeline
00094       if( m_reactor.assembly().isExternal(object) ) 
00095        throw TokenError(**i, "Facts cannot be applied to external timelines");
00096 
00097       // OK now should I ignore this fact 
00098       if( m_reactor.assembly().isIgnored(object) ) {
00099        m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00100                           <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00101                           <<" as its object is on the Ignore list.";
00102        m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00103       } else {
00104        if( (*i)->start()->baseDomain().getLowerBound() > mission_scope.getUpperBound() 
00105            || (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound() < end_scope.getLowerBound() ) {
00106          m_reactor.log("WARN")<<"Ignoring the fact "<<object->toString()
00107                             <<'.'<<(*i)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00108                             <<" as it is outside of mission scope";
00109          m_reactor.assembly().ignore(*i);
00110        } else {
00111          EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain start_bounds(mission_scope), 
00112            end_bounds(end_scope);
00113          start_bounds.intersect((*i)->start()->baseDomain());
00114          end_bounds.intersect((*i)->end()->baseDomain());
00115          if( !start_bounds.isEmpty() )
00116            (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(start_bounds);
00117          if( !end_bounds.isEmpty() )
00118            (*i)->end()->restrictBaseDomain(end_bounds);
00119          (*i)->activate();
00120          object->constrain(*i, *i);
00121        }
00122       }
00123     }
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void DbCore::set_internal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj) {
00128   m_internals.insert(std::make_pair(obj, EUROPA::TokenId::noId()));
00129 }
00130 
00131 void DbCore::notify(state_map::value_type const &obs) {
00132   std::pair<state_map::iterator, bool> ret = m_externals.insert(obs);
00133   if( !ret.second ) {
00134     EUROPA::TokenId pred = ret.first->second;
00135     m_completed_obs.insert(pred);
00136     ret.first->second = obs.second;
00137   }
00138   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token"), '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] OBSERVATION "
00139           <<obs.first->toString()
00140           <<'.'<<obs.second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00141   m_observations.insert(obs.second);
00142 }
00143 
00144 bool DbCore::update_externals() {
00145   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00146   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00147  
00148   // First terminate former observations
00149   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=m_completed_obs.begin();
00150       m_completed_obs.end()!=i; ++i) {
00151     debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), '['<<cur<<"] closing old observation "
00152             <<(*i)->toString()<<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00153     (*i)->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now); 
00154     debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), '['<<cur<<"] end time closed :"
00155             <<"\n\tbase "<<(*i)->end()->baseDomain().toString()
00156             <<"\n\tlast "<<(*i)->end()->lastDomain().toString());
00157     m_reactor.removed(*i);
00158     m_terminated.insert(*i);
00159   }
00160   m_completed_obs.clear();
00161   
00162   // Now apply inertial value asumption on cuureent observations
00163   for(state_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin(); m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00164     debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), '['<<cur<<"] applying inertial value assumption to "
00165             <<i->first->toString()
00166             <<'.'<<i->second->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString());
00167     i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);    
00168   }
00169   debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), '['<<cur<<"] Propagating external state updates");
00170   return propagate();
00171 }
00172 
00173 bool DbCore::synchronize() {
00174   size_t steps = 0;
00175   
00176   if( resolve(steps) ) {
00177     if( update_internals(steps) ) {
00178       if( resolve(steps) ) {
00179        debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "SUCESS after "<<steps<<" steps.");
00180        return true;
00181       } else 
00182        debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "FAILED to resolve internal timelines updates");
00183     } else
00184       debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "FAILED to identify internal timelines state");
00185   } else
00186     debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "FAILED to resolve current state");
00187   return false;
00188 }
00189 
00190 bool DbCore::process_agenda(EUROPA::TokenSet agenda, size_t &steps) {
00191   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00192   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00193 
00194   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=agenda.begin(); agenda.end()!=i; ++i) {
00195     if( (*i)->getObject()->lastDomain().isSingleton() && (*i)->isInactive() ) {
00196       EUROPA::TokenId cand;
00197       
00198       if( assembly.in_synch_scope(*i, cand) ) {
00199        debugMsg(dbg("trex:agenda"), "resolving "<<(*i)->toString());
00200        ++steps;
00201        if( !( assembly.resolve(*i, cand, steps) && propagate() ) ) {
00202          debugMsg(dbg("trex:agenda"), "FAILED to resolve "<<(*i)->toString());
00203          m_reactor.logPlan("failure");
00204          return false;
00205        }
00206       }
00207     }
00208   }
00209   return true;
00210 }
00211 
00212 bool DbCore::resolve(size_t &steps) {
00213   size_t last_count;
00214   // Loop until quiescence
00215   do {
00216     last_count = steps;
00217     
00218     if( !propagate() )
00219       return false;
00220 
00221     // first process the facts
00222     condDebugMsg(!m_facts_agenda.empty(), dbg("trex:sync"), 
00223                m_facts_agenda.size()<<" facts in the agenda.");
00224     if( !process_agenda(m_facts_agenda, steps) ) {
00225       debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "Failed to resolve facts");
00226       return false;
00227     }
00228     // then process everything else
00229     condDebugMsg(!m_agenda.empty(), dbg("trex:sync"), 
00230                m_agenda.size()<<" tokens in the agenda.");
00231     if( !process_agenda(m_agenda, steps) ) {
00232       debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "Failed to resolve tokens");
00233       return false;
00234     }
00235   } while( last_count!=steps );
00236   return true;
00237 }
00238 
00239 bool DbCore::update_internals(size_t &steps) {
00240   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00241   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00242   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00243   std::list<EUROPA::TokenId> new_tokens;
00244   
00245   if( assembly.invalid() )
00246     return false;
00247   for(state_map::const_iterator i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00248     EUROPA::TokenId active = i->second, last_obs;
00249     seq_iter p_cur, last;
00250 
00251     if( active.isId() ) {
00252       active->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00253       if( active->isMerged() )
00254        active = active->getActiveToken();
00255     }
00256 
00257     boost::tie(p_cur, last) = find_after(i->first, cur);
00258     if( p_cur!=last && (*p_cur)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) 
00259       last_obs = *p_cur;
00260     else {
00261       // did not find an observation for current tick
00262       debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), '['<<cur<<"] setting "<<i->first->toString()
00263               <<" state to its default.");
00264       if( !assembly.insert_default(i->first, last_obs, steps) ) {
00265        debugMsg(dbg("trex:sync"), "FAILED to insert default value on "
00266                <<i->first->toString());
00267        return false;
00268       }
00269     } 
00270    
00271     if( last_obs->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00272       last_obs->start()->specify(cur);
00273       if( last_obs!=active && active.isId() )
00274        active->end()->specify(cur);    
00275     }
00276   }
00277   if( !propagate() )
00278     return false;
00279   return true;
00280 }
00281 
00282 bool DbCore::remove_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool restrict) {
00283   if( m_goals.erase(tok) ) {
00284     if( restrict )
00285       tok->restrictBaseDomains();
00286     m_reactor.removed(tok);
00287     return true;
00288   }
00289   return false;
00290 }
00291 
00292 
00293 bool DbCore::reset_goal(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok, bool aggressive) {
00294   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00295   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain future(cur, PLUS_INFINITY);
00296   EUROPA::TokenId active = (tok->isMerged()?tok->getActiveToken():tok);
00297   
00298   if( active->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<cur ) {
00299     debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "DISCARD completed goal "<<tok->toString()
00300             <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00301     return true;
00302   }
00303   if( tok->start()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00304     if( aggressive ) {
00305       debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "DISCARD goal started  in the past "<<tok->toString()
00306               <<": "<<tok->getPredicateName().toString());
00307       return true;
00308     }
00309   }
00310   
00311   return false;
00312 }
00313 
00314 bool DbCore::relax(bool aggressive) {
00315   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();  
00316 
00317   m_reactor.log("core")<<"Beginning database relax"
00318                      <<(aggressive?" and forget about the past":"");
00319   debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "START "<<(aggressive?"aggressive ":"")<<"relax");
00320   // recall all of my former objectives
00321   m_reactor.relax();
00322   // Put the solver out of the way 
00323   assembly.solver().clear();
00324   assembly.mark_inactive();
00325 
00326   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00327   
00328   // First pass : deal with facts produced by TREX
00329 
00330   EUROPA::TokenSet relax_list = m_observations;
00331   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00332       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) {
00333     if( aggressive && (*i)->end()->baseDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00334        debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "DISCARD past fact "<<(*i)->toString()
00335                <<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00336        (*i)->discard();     
00337     } else 
00338       (*i)->cancel();
00339   }
00340 
00341   // Second pass : deal with the goals 
00342   relax_list = m_goals;
00343   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00344       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) 
00345     if( reset_goal(*i, aggressive) ) 
00346       (*i)->discard();
00347     else {
00348       // Make sure that the domain is fully relaxed 
00349       std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId> const &vars = (*i)->getVariables();
00350       if( !(*i)->isInactive() )
00351        (*i)->cancel();
00352 
00353       for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator v=vars.begin();
00354          vars.end()!=v; ++v) {
00355        if( (*v)->canBeSpecified() && (*v)->isSpecified() )
00356          (*v)->reset();
00357        (*v)->relax();
00358       }
00359     }
00360   // third pass get rid of recalled goals
00361   relax_list = m_recalled;
00362   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=relax_list.begin(); 
00363       relax_list.end()!=i; ++i) {
00364     debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "DISCARD recalled goal "<<(*i)->toString());
00365     (*i)->discard();
00366   }
00367       
00368   debugMsg(dbg("trex:relax"), "SUCESS");
00369   m_reactor.logPlan();
00370   return true;
00371 }
00372 
00373 void DbCore::step() {
00374   Assembly &assembly = m_reactor.assembly();
00375 
00376   debugMsg(dbg("trex:step"), '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()<<"] START deliberation step");
00377   
00378   if( propagate() ) {
00379     DbSolver &solver = assembly.solver();
00380     
00381     if( assembly.inactive() ) 
00382       assembly.mark_active();
00383     solver.step();
00384     process_pending();
00385     if( solver.noMoreFlaws() ) {      
00386       m_reactor.end_deliberation();
00387     }
00388   }
00389 }
00390 
00391 void DbCore::doDispatch() {
00392   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getClient();
00393 
00394   // todo add a notion of guards to avoid to dispatch too early
00395   for( state_map::const_iterator i=m_externals.begin();
00396        m_externals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00397     TICK from, to;
00398     if( m_reactor.dispatch_window(i->first, from, to) ) {
00399       seq_iter it, last;
00400       boost::tie(it, last) = find_after(i->first, from);
00401 
00402       // skipp the tokens that are necessarily before from 
00403       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<from; ++it);
00404 
00405       // now dispatch tokens that can start before to 
00406       // and are not part of deliberation
00407       for( ;last!=it && (*it)->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()<to; ++it)
00408        if( !m_reactor.assembly().in_deliberation(*it) ) {
00409          // // to be safe just put it in a new token 
00410          // EUROPA::TokenId 
00411          //   requested = cli->createToken((*it)->getPredicateName().c_str(),
00412          //                         NULL, false, false);
00413          // cli->merge(requested, (*it));
00414          m_reactor.request(i->first, *it);
00415          debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), '['<<m_reactor.getCurrentTick()
00416                  <<"] REQUESTED "<<(*it)->toString()<<": "
00417                  <<i->first->toString()<<'.'
00418                  <<(*it)->getUnqualifiedPredicateName().toString()
00419                  <<"\n\tstart = "<<(*it)->start()->lastDomain().toString()
00420                  <<"\n\tduration = "<<(*it)->duration()->lastDomain().toString()
00421                  <<"\n\tend = "<<(*it)->end()->lastDomain().toString());
00422        }
00423     }
00424   }
00425 }
00426 
00427 void DbCore::doNotify() {
00428   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00429   EUROPA::DbClientId cli = m_reactor.assembly().plan_db()->getClient();
00430   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain now(cur, cur), future(cur+1, PLUS_INFINITY);
00431 
00432   // Update my internal state
00433   for(state_map::iterator i=m_internals.begin(); m_internals.end()!=i; ++i) {
00434     seq_iter p, p_cur, last;
00435     
00436     boost::tie(p, last) = find_after(i->first, cur-1);
00437     
00438     p_cur = p;
00439     if( last!=p_cur && (*p_cur)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) 
00440       ++p_cur;
00441     if( last==p_cur || (*p_cur)->start()->lastDomain().getLowerBound()>cur )
00442       throw EuropaException("Unexpected missing state for internal timeline "+
00443                          i->first->getName().toString());
00444     else if( (*p_cur)->start()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00445       // From here  I know that I have a new observation 
00446       EUROPA::TokenId obs = cli->createToken((*p_cur)->getPredicateName().c_str(),
00447                                         NULL, false, true);
00448       obs->start()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00449       obs->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00450       obs->getObject()->specify(i->first->getKey());
00451       cli->merge(obs, *p_cur);
00452       propagate();
00453       // restrict the fact attributes to what we are going to produce
00454       obs->getObject()->restrictBaseDomain(obs->getObject()->getLastDomain());
00455       for(std::vector<EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId>::const_iterator 
00456            v=obs->parameters().begin(); obs->parameters().end()!=v; ++v) 
00457        (*v)->restrictBaseDomain((*v)->lastDomain());                
00458       m_observations.insert(obs);
00459       
00460       // check if any requested goal was completed
00461       EUROPA::TokenSet cands = (*p)->getMergedTokens();
00462       if( (*p)!=i->second ) {
00463        if( i->second.isId() ) 
00464          cands.erase(i->second);
00465        cands.insert(*p);
00466       }
00467       for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator it=cands.begin(); cands.end()!=it; ++it) {
00468        // We assume that if a goal token is completed then
00469        // the goal itself is completed
00470        // - note formally it is not necessarily true as this
00471        //   goal may depend on future tokens. To check that
00472        //   I need to se iff this token is the master of a token
00473        //   that is yet to be completed... this could be checked
00474        //   in the future but for now lets try to be efficient 
00475        //   instead
00476        remove_goal(*it);    
00477       }
00478       // finally update the current state
00479       if( i->second.isId() ) {
00480        i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(now);
00481        m_terminated.insert(i->second);
00482       }
00483       i->second = obs;
00484       m_reactor.notify(i->first, obs);
00485     }
00486     i->second->end()->restrictBaseDomain(future);
00487   } 
00488 }
00489 
00490 void DbCore::recall(EUROPA::eint const &key) {
00491   EUROPA::EntityId entity = EUROPA::Entity::getEntity(key);
00492   
00493   if( entity.isId() && EUROPA::TokenId::convertable(entity) ) {
00494     EUROPA::TokenId goal(entity);
00495     
00496     if( m_goals.erase(goal) ) 
00497       m_recalled.insert(goal);
00498   }
00499 }
00500 
00501 bool DbCore::propagate() {
00502   if( m_reactor.assembly().propagate() ) {
00503     process_pending();
00504     return true;
00505   }
00506   debugMsg(dbg("trex:core"), "Failed to propagate");
00507   return false;
00508 }
00509 
00510 void DbCore::process_pending() {
00511   EUROPA::TokenSet pending;
00512   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain scope(m_reactor.getInitialTick(),
00513                               m_reactor.getFinalTick());
00514   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00515   
00516   std::swap(pending, m_pending);
00517   condDebugMsg(!pending.empty(), dbg("trex:pending"), '['<<cur<<"] "
00518               <<pending.size()<<" pending tokens");
00519   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=pending.begin(); pending.end()!=i; ++i) {
00520     if( m_reactor.assembly().ignored(*i) ) {
00521       debugMsg(dbg("trex:token"), '['<<cur<<"] IGNORE "<<(*i)->toString()
00522               <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00523     } else {
00524       EUROPA::TokenId master = (*i)->master();
00525       
00526       if( master.isNoId() ) {
00527        if( (*i)->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED) ) {
00528          m_goals.insert(*i);
00529          // A new goal necessirly start during the mission 
00530          (*i)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(scope);
00531          propagate();
00532          debugMsg(dbg("trex:token"), '['<<cur<<"] GOAL "<<(*i)->toString()
00533                  <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00534        }
00535       }
00536       if( (*i)->isFact() ) {
00537        debugMsg(dbg("trex:token"), '['<<cur<<"] FACT "<<(*i)->toString()
00538                <<": "<<(*i)->getPredicateName().toString());
00539       }
00540       if( (*i)->isInactive() )
00541        add_to_agenda(*i);
00542     }
00543   }
00544 }
00545 
00546 void DbCore::add_to_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00547   m_pending.erase(token);
00548   if( token->isFact() ) 
00549     m_facts_agenda.insert(token);
00550   else 
00551     m_agenda.insert(token);
00552 }
00553 
00554 void DbCore::remove_from_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00555   if( token->isFact() ) 
00556     m_facts_agenda.erase(token);
00557   else 
00558     m_agenda.erase(token);
00559 }
00560 
00561 void DbCore::remove_observation(EUROPA::TokenId const &tok) {
00562   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00563 
00564   if( m_observations.erase(tok) &&
00565       tok->end()->getUpperBound()>=cur ) {
00566     EUROPA::ObjectDomain const &domain=tok->getObject()->baseDomain();
00567     EUROPA::ObjectId object = domain.getObject(domain.getSingletonValue());
00568     state_map::iterator i = m_internals.find(object);
00569     if( m_internals.end()!=i ) {
00570       if( tok==i->second )
00571        i->second = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00572     } else {
00573       i = m_externals.find(tok);
00574       if( m_externals.end()!=i &&
00575          tok==i->second ) 
00576        i->second = EUROPA::TokenId::noId();
00577     }
00578   }
00579 }
00580 
00581 void DbCore::archive() {
00582   TICK cur = m_reactor.getCurrentTick();
00583 
00584   if( m_reactor.assembly().inactive() ) {
00585     EUROPA::TokenSet terminated = m_terminated, removed;
00586 
00587     condDebugMsg(!terminated.empty(), dbg("trex:archive"), 
00588                "Evaluating "<<terminated.size()<<" facts for archiving.");
00589     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=terminated.begin(); 
00590        terminated.end()!=i; ++i) {
00591       EUROPA::TokenId token = *i;
00592       // First case the token is inactive 
00593       if( token->isInactive() ) {
00594        debugMsg(dbg("trex:archive"), "DISCARD inactive fact "<<token->toString());
00595        removed.insert(token);
00596       } else {
00597        if( token->isMerged() ) {
00598          token = token->getActiveToken();
00599          debugMsg(dbg("trex:archive"), "REPLACE fact "<<(*i)->toString()
00600                  <<" by "<<token->toString());
00601          token->restrictBaseDomains();
00602          token->makeFact();
00603          m_terminated.insert(token);
00604          removed.insert(token);
00605        } else 
00606          token->restrictBaseDomains();
00607        // Look for merged goals or tokens with no master
00608        EUROPA::TokenSet tokens = token->getMergedTokens();
00609        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator j=tokens.begin(); tokens.end()!=j; ++j) {
00610          if( remove_goal(*j, false) || (*j)->master().isNoId() ) {
00611            debugMsg(dbg("trex:archive"), 
00612                    "DISCARD merged token "<<(*j)->toString());
00613            removed.insert(token);
00614          }
00615        }
00616        // Look for inactive slaves 
00617        tokens = token->slaves();
00618        for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator j=tokens.begin(); tokens.end()!=j; ++j) {
00619          if( !(*j)->isActive() 
00620              && (*j)->end()->lastDomain().getUpperBound()<=cur ) {
00621            if( !( (*j)->isMerged() && (*j)->isFact() ) )
00622               removed.insert(*j);
00623          }
00624        }
00625        // if( token->slaves().empty() ) {
00626        //   EUROPA::TokenId master = token->master();
00627        //   if( master.isNoId() )
00628        //     removed.insert(token);
00629        // }
00630       }
00631     }    
00632     terminated = m_recalled;
00633     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=terminated.begin(); 
00634        terminated.end()!=i; ++i) {
00635       // for now play it safe and just remove the one that are not active
00636       // in the future we may be more aggressive on this one
00637       if( !(*i)->isActive() ) {
00638        debugMsg(dbg("trex:archive"), "DISCARD recalled goal "<<(*i)->toString());
00639        removed.insert(*i);
00640       }
00641     }
00642     condDebugMsg(!removed.empty(), dbg("trex:archive"), 
00643                "Archiving "<<removed.size()<<" tokens");
00644     for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator i=removed.begin(); 
00645        removed.end()!=i; ++i)
00646       (*i)->discard();
00647   }
00648 }
00649

00651 // europa callbacks
00652 
00653 void DbCore::notifyAdded(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00654   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "ADD "<<token->toString()
00655           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00656   m_pending.insert(token);
00657 }
00658 
00659 void DbCore::notifyRemoved(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00660   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "REMOVE "<<token->toString()
00661           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00662   m_pending.erase(token);
00663   remove_from_agenda(token);
00664   remove_goal(token, false);
00665   m_completed_obs.erase(token);
00666   remove_observation(token);
00667   m_terminated.erase(token);
00668   m_recalled.erase(token);
00669 }
00670 
00671 void DbCore::notifyActivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00672   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "ACTIVE "<<token->toString()
00673           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00674   remove_from_agenda(token);
00675 }
00676 
00677 void DbCore::notifyDeactivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00678   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "INACTIVE "<<token->toString()
00679           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00680   add_to_agenda(token);
00681 }
00682 
00683 void DbCore::notifyMerged(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00684   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "MERGE "<<token->toString()
00685           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00686   remove_from_agenda(token);
00687 }
00688 
00689 void DbCore::notifySplit(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00690   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "SPLIT "<<token->toString()
00691           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00692   add_to_agenda(token);
00693 }
00694 
00695 void DbCore::notifyCommitted(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00696   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "COMMIT "<<token->toString()
00697           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00698 }
00699 
00700 void DbCore::notifyRejected(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00701   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "REJECT "<<token->toString()
00702           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00703   remove_from_agenda(token);
00704 }
00705 
00706 void DbCore::notifyTerminated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00707   debugMsg(dbg("trex:token:state"), "TERMINATE "<<token->toString()
00708           <<": "<<token->getPredicateName().toString());
00709   remove_from_agenda(token);
00710   m_terminated.erase(token);
00711 }
